title: Delta Cancrids
text: The Delta Cancrids is a medium strength <a href="meteor%20shower">meteor shower</a> lasting from December 14 to February 14, the main shower from January 1 to January 24. The <a href="Radiant%20%28meteor%20shower%29">radiant</a> is located in the constellation of <a href="Cancer%20%28constellation%29">Cancer</a>, near <a href="Delta%20Cancri">Delta Cancri</a>. It peaks on January 17 each year, with only four meteors per hour. It was first discovered in 1872, but the first solid evidence of this phenomenon came in 1971. The source of this meteor shower is unknown, it has been suggested that it is similar to the orbit of <a href="asteroid">asteroid</a> <a href="2001%20YB5">2001 YB5</a>.
